alert.note: Alert for Davis; Salt Lake (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 10:35PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northern Utah, including the following counties, Davis and Salt Lake. * WHEN...Until 1230 AM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1035 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, Farmington, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, South Salt Lake, Herriman, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross and Bluffdale.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
